content: If I've just cloned a GI repository locally, made some changes, and then gone to commit, how on earth can GIT be prompting me to commit changes I didn't make?
I probably won't get a chance to see your reply for a few days, but it'd help to have the exact message git gave you.
I think, actually, it was a bug in source tree. Restarting source tree after re-organising my repositories made it start acting rationally
